#summary Hints for binding your RDS to the RDSTL

= Hints =

* the `tag` function should be put into the namespace of the first parameter, i.e.
{{{
namespace foo {
  struct my_rds {/**/};

  template <typename X>
  std::string tag (my_rds, xpath<X>) {
    return "my_rds";
  }
}
}}}

* you should _never_ overload the `children` function!
